svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 98px; height: 1px; padding-top: 68px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 401px; height: 1px; padding-top: 26px; margin-left: 250px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 93px; margin-left: 251px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
- desired_os: deprecated, unused
- current_os: immutable from NBI after provisioning
- installed_packages: new field, filled at runtime
- new_versions: list of packages readyÂ to upgrade, or next EMT version

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 68px; margin-left: 171px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 244px; margin-left: 182px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 150px; height: 1px; padding-top: 276px; margin-left: 187px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Tells what to do during an update. Immutable. Can be linked to multiple Instances, Regions, Sites.
Valid only for mutable:
- install_packages
- apt_repos
Valid for both Mutable and Immutable:
- update_policy: enum

switch.text: Tells what to do during a...

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 263px; margin-left: 493px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Result of a OSUpdatePolicy
Handled by MM
RO from NB API
- start_time
- end_time
- result_details (updated version)
- status_details
- status
- status_indicator
- status_timestamp
